title: Pretty circus/western type
content:
I checked [this thread](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829230822/http:/www.typophile.com/node/12892) and found a few 'close, but no cigar' options on Font Mesa, but I can't seem to identify this font. Any ideas?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829230822im_/http:/typophile.com/files/sample_6460.jpg)
author: lunasoleil

comments.content: That's [Jessica Slater's](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829230822/http:/www.moorstation.org/typoasis/designers/jfs/jester.htm) Ferrule, which may be found in the Fair Faces package of fonts.
Thanks, Mike! I never would have found that on my own, lol.
